mapper.select: SELECT sj.job_id, sj.begin_time, sj.deadline, sc.id, sj.job_name, sc.name FROM sys_job sj left join sys_course sc on sj.course_id = sc.id WHERE sj.job_id = #{jobId}
SELECT j.job_name, j.job_id, j.deadline, j.course_id, j.begin_time FROM sys_job j WHERE j.course_id = #{courseId}

SELECT j.job_id, j.job_name, c.name, c.id, j.begin_time, j.deadline, c.id, sdj.dept_id FROM sys_job j LEFT JOIN sys_course c ON j.course_id = c.id LEFT JOIN sys_dept_job sdj on j.job_id = sdj.job_id
AND (FROM_UNIXTIME(j.deadline / 1000, '%m') = #{month} AND FROM_UNIXTIME(j.deadline / 1000, '%Y') = #{year})
AND j.job_name LIKE concat('%',#{keyword},'%')
AND c.name=#{courseName}
